name: ZJamter
description:
ZJamter is a 2D FPS, where you have to kill every zombie in order to save the civilian population.

It's made in 48 hours for MalagaJam Weekend. The theme was "Cities of the Future".

Plot

"Nueva Badajoz
2154 A.D.

The human race is about to overcome the ultimate natural boundary: the resurrection of the dead.

But something horrible has happened: a group of religious fanatics has released some of the most dangerous experimental subjects and now thy are spreaing terror among the civilian population.

You are Gonzalo Saints, the best sniper in the city. Your mission is to kill every undead."

Controls

Use the mouse to aim and shoot.
Use R to reload.
Use headphones to locate zombies.

Credits

Graphics: @raulbayushi
Audio: @vaus_spaceship
Code: @_Cafar
